metadata.title: CVE-2024-45819 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: PVH guests have their ACPI tables constructed by the toolstack.  Theconstruction involves building the tables in local memory, which arethen copied into guest memory.  While actually used parts of the localmemory are filled in correctly, excess space that is being allocated isleft with its prior contents.

criterions.comment: xen package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
